attributes.action: REFERENDUM ON UK WITHDRAWING FROM THE EU
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government is being controlled by unconstitutional  EU directives and is costing the UK millions a day to remain members of the EU.Many of the electorate want action from our Government. Only a proper consituted Referendum will indicate how many.
Please Debate this issue urgently in Government and arrange for an early Referendum before it is too late!!
